title: LAP: The Resurgence of Collective Memory, Truth, and Justice Mobilizations Part 3: Artistic and Cultural Resistance
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews the issue editor, Roberta Villalon, on the subject of the September 2016 issue: "The Resurgence of Collective Memory, Truth, and Justice Mobilizations Part 3: Artistic and Cultural Resistance."
